title: Dustin Johnson back on a team after 2-year absence
text: Lobo women back on the court; Johnson returns after 2 years The University of New Mexico women's basketball team started fall workout Monday, and while there are some fresh faces this year, Monday's practice also marked the return of a former player who hasn't seen game action in more than two years. Recent related news Lassana Diarra, nicknamed "Lass", has not played for France since 2010 when he was forced to leave the squad for medical purposes.
